utils.get_name_from_path¶

utils.get_name_from_path(file_path)¶

Extracts filename from a given Path

Parameters:
file_path: `~pathlib.Path`

path pointing to the file

Returns:
filenamestr

name of the file with extension

Examples

>>> path_to_file = Path('D:/BJ_Data/21_04_20/break_junction_34.h5')
>>> get_name_from_path(path_to_file)
'break_junction_34.h5'

MCBJ STM-BJ
